description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将军衔。曾任中央军事委员会委员、中国人民解放军总政治部主任、总装备部部长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a General (Shang Jiang) of the People's Liberation Army. He has served as a member of the Central Military Commission, Director of the PLA General Political Department, and Director of the PLA General Armaments Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所顶尖研究型大学，隶属于工业和信息化部。
description.en: A top research university in China, affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一场自1966年5月至1976年10月期间，由毛泽东与中央文化革命小组，自上而下动员的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China from May 1966 to October 1976, launched from the top down by Mao Zedong and the Central Cultural Revolution Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军火箭军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战略导弹部队。
description.en: The strategic missile force of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会主管全军党的工作和政治工作的最高统率机关，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: Formerly the supreme command organ of the Central Military Commission responsible for party and political work throughout the military, it was abolished during the 2016 military reforms.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会
en: Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense

description.zh-cn: 简称国防科工委，是中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的负责国防科学技术工业的组成部门。
description.en: Abbreviated as COSTIND, it was a former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for the national defense science, technology, and industry.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority within the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，曾任中央军事委员会副主席、国防部部长。
description.en: A Chinese military figure who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission and Minister of National Defense.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总装备部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部
en: General Armaments Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会主管全军装备工作的最高统率机关，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: Formerly the supreme command organ of the Central Military Commission responsible for military equipment work, it was abolished during the 2016 military reforms.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme state military leading body of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中央军事委员会副主席，因腐败问题被查处。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who was investigated for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任，后在接受组织谈话期间自杀身亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Director of the PLA General Political Department, who committed suicide during an investigation.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the PLA General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总装备部政治委员。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Political Commissar of the PLA General Armaments Department.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治主张，认为军队应效忠于国家而非特定政党。
description.en: A political principle asserting that the military should be loyal to the state rather than a specific political party.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐的妻子，曾任总参高级工程师。
description.en: Wife of Li Jinai, formerly a senior engineer in the General Staff Department.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐之子，中国科学院软件研究所研究员，曾任云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州州委书记。
description.en: Son of Li Jinai, a researcher at the Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences, and former Party Secretary of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture in Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐的妹妹。
description.en: Sister of Li Jinai.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐的外甥女。
description.en: Niece of Li Jinai.

description.zh-cn: 山东省的一个旧县名，现为滕州市。
description.en: A former county name in Shandong Province, now Tengzhou City.

en: General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军现行军衔制中的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the current military rank system of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 1961年考入哈尔滨工业大学，在工程力学系学习，1966年毕业。
description.en: Admitted to Harbin Institute of Technology in 1961, studied in the Department of Engineering Mechanics, and graduated in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 于1965年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 由于文化大革命爆发，李继耐于1966年至1967年在校待分配，推迟了其职业生涯的开始。
description.en: Due to the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Li Jinai was waiting for assignment at his university from 1966 to 1967, which delayed the start of his career.

description.zh-cn: 1967年12月通过冬季征兵入伍，加入中国人民解放军，直至2013年退役。
description.en: Joined the People's Liberation Army through winter conscription in December 1967 and served until his retirement in 2013.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 自1969年4月起在第二炮兵部队（火箭军前身）任职，曾任副排长、干事、副政治委员、基地副政委等职务。
description.en: Served in the Second Artillery Corps (predecessor of the Rocket Force) from April 1969, holding positions such as deputy platoon leader, officer, deputy political commissar, and deputy political commissar of a base.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

position.zh-cn: 干部管理部部长、副主任、主任
position.en: Director of the Cadre Management Department, Deputy Director, Director

description.zh-cn: 李继耐曾两度在总政治部任职，早期任干部管理部部长、副主任，后期担任总政治部主任。
description.en: Li Jinai served in the General Political Department twice, early in his career as Director of the Cadre Management Department and Deputy Director, and later as Director of the General Political Department.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

description.zh-cn: 1992年11月调任国防科工委副政治委员，1995年7月升任政治委员。
description.en: Transferred to COSTIND as Deputy Political Commissar in November 1992, and was promoted to Political Commissar in July 1995.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 中央候补委员、中央委员
position.en: Alternate Member of the Central Committee, Member of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 于中共十四大当选为中央候补委员，十五、十六、十七大当选为中央委员。
description.en: Elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee at the 14th Party Congress, and as a full member at the 15th, 16th, and 17th Party Congresses.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总装备部

description.zh-cn: 1998年总装备部成立时任首任政委，2002年转任部长。
description.en: Served as the first Political Commissar of the General Armaments Department upon its establishment in 1998, and became its Director in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 1998年总装备部成立后，李继耐与部长曹刚川搭档，分别担任政治委员和部长。
description.en: After the establishment of the General Armaments Department in 1998, Li Jinai worked alongside Director Cao Gangchuan, serving as Political Commissar and Director respectively.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中共十六大和十七大后，被任命为中共中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: After the 16th and 17th National Congress of the CPC, he was appointed as a member of the CPC Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 在第十届和第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上，被任命为中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: At the first sessions of the 10th and 11th National People's Congresses, he was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐接替徐才厚担任总政治部主任，因徐才厚被增补为中央军委副主席。
description.en: Li Jinai succeeded Xu Caihou as Director of the General Political Department after Xu was promoted to Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2012年10月，张阳接替李继耐升任总政治部主任。
description.en: In October 2012, Zhang Yang succeeded Li Jinai as Director of the General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 2004年9月，陈炳德接替李继耐担任中国人民解放军总装备部部长。
description.en: In September 2004, Chen Bingde succeeded Li Jinai as Director of the PLA General Armaments Department.

description.zh-cn: 2002年11月，迟万春接替李继耐担任中国人民解放军总装备部政治委员。
description.en: In November 2002, Chi Wanchun succeeded Li Jinai as Political Commissar of the PLA General Armaments Department.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐曾公开表示要坚决抵制“军队非党化、非政治化”和“军队国家化”等错误政治观点。
description.en: Li Jinai publicly stated the need to resolutely resist erroneous political viewpoints such as 'departy-ization and depoliticization of the military' and 'nationalization of the military'.

description.zh-cn: 孙锦云是李继耐的妻子。
description.en: Sun Jinyun is the wife of Li Jinai.

description.zh-cn: 李磊是李继耐的儿子。
description.en: Li Lei is the son of Li Jinai.

description.zh-cn: 李继红是李继耐的妹妹。
description.en: Li Jihong is the sister of Li Jinai.

description.zh-cn: 李凡妮是李继耐的外甥女（妹妹李继红的女儿）。
description.en: Li Fanni is Li Jinai's niece (the daughter of his sister Li Jihong).

description.zh-cn: 2000年6月晋升上将军衔。
description.en: Promoted to the rank of General in June 2000.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐出生于山东省滕县。
description.en: Li Jinai was born in Teng County, Shandong Province.
